document.full_text: the security council on thursday authorized measures to protect libyan civilians from forces loyal to colonel muammar el-qaddafi, but the u.s. military might confine itself to a supporting role.
document.title: as u.n. backs military action in libya, u.s. role is unclear
lines_and_colors: the security council on thursday authorized measures to protect libyan civilians from forces loyal to colonel muammar el-qaddafi, but the u.s. military might confine itself to a supporting role.
